titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 32000D0029 English

2000/29/EC: Council Decision of 28 June 1999 on the conclusion of the Agreement with the Republic of Iceland and the Kindom of Norway on the establishment of rights and obligations between Ireland and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on the one hand, and the Republic of Iceland and the Kingdom of Norway, on the other, in areas of the Schengen acquis which apply to these States

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 2000/29/EC: Council Decision of 28 June 1999 on the conclusion of the Agreement with the Republic of Iceland and the Kindom of Norway on the establishment of rights and obligations between Ireland and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on the one hand, and the Republic of Iceland and the Kingdom of Norway, on the other, in areas of the Schengen acquis which apply to these States
body.p: on the conclusion of the Agreement with the Republic of Iceland and the Kindom of Norway on the establishment of rights and obligations between Ireland and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on the one hand, and the Republic of Iceland and the Kingdom of Norway, on the other, in areas of the Schengen acquis which apply to these States
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

Having regard to Article 6(2) of the Protocol, annexed by the Treaty of Amsterdam to the Treaty on the European Union and to the Treaty establishing the European Community integrating the Schengen acquis into the framework of the European Union,

The Agreement with the Republic of Iceland and the Kingdom of Norway on the establishment of rights and obligations between Ireland and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on the one hand, and the Republic of Iceland and the Kingdom of Norway, on the other, in areas of the Schengen acquis which apply to these States is hereby approved.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
